description:
Each time you perform a Harvest action, decrease its value by 3.
 You may still spend servants to increase the action value and you must apply your Card’s effects.

Each time you receive servants, 
	  					you receive 1 fewer servant.

Each time you receive coins,
						you receive 1 fewer coin.

Each time you gain Military
						Points, gain 1 fewer Military
						Point.

Each time you perform a
						Production action, decrease its
						value by 3. You may still spend 
						servants to increase the action 
						value and you must apply your 
						Card’s effects.

Each time you take a Character
						Card, your action receives
						a -4 reduction of its value.
						You may still spend servants to
						increase the action value,and you
						must apply your Card’s effects.

Each time you take a Venture
						Card, your action receives
						a -4 reduction of its value.
						You may still spend servants to
						increase the action value and you
						must apply your Card’s effects.

Each time you take a Territory
						Card, your action receives
						a -4 reduction of its value.
						You may still spend servants to
						increase the action value and you
						must apply your Card’s effects.

Each time you take a Building
						Card, your action receives
						a -4 reduction of its value.
						You may still spend servants to
						increase the action value and you
						must apply your Card’s effects.

At the end of the game, you
						don’t score points for any of your
						Influenced Characters.

At the end of the game, you
						don’t score points for any of your
						Conquered Territories.

At the end of the game, you
						don’t score points for any of your
						Encouraged Ventures.
